text: Hebraica-Rebouças is a train station on CPTM Line 9-Emerald, located in the district of Pinheiros in São Paulo. The station is located next to Eldorado Shopping Mall and the São Paulo A Hebraica club. It was built by CPTM and opened on 14 June 2000. ==References== Category:CPTM stations Category:Railway stations opened in 2000 Category:2000 establishments in Brazil
title: Hebraica-Rebouças (CPTM)
